data.text: @GChopsfine Hi, we regret the delay. Please know our operations depend upon various uncontrollable factors which determine our schedule. We hope to provide you with better service in the near future. ~Nandita
@abhisheksingh5 Mr Singh, we regret the inconvenience caused. We have duly noted your feedback. We hope to serve you better in the future.~ Nandita
@0xNotthatsundar Have a pleasant journey. ~Diyashi
@SabarmatiB We regret to hear this, Ms Bhattacharya. We are getting this checked. Allow us some time to get back to you with an update. ~Diyashi
@NisarShaikh123 We regret to hear this, Mr Shaikh, we understand your disappointment. Could you please share the PNR via DM, so we may check and assist you. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@pratyush626 We regret the inconvenience caused, we are getting this checked. Allow us some time to get back to you with an update.
@AnuragC1106 Mr Chaturvedi, thank you for the shoutout. We are glad to know that you're delighted with our hospitality. We are looking forward to having you onboard soon again. ~Ojasvi #GoIndiGo

data.text: @ritanshu95 Hello, as checked the flight way delayed, could you please the PNR via DM, so we may check and assist you. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@aafreen__ Hello, we understand your concern. Could you please share your PNR via DM so we may check ad assist you. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@ritanshu95 Hello, we understand your concern, we are getting this checked, allow us some time to get back to you with an update. ~Diyashi
@nadealivohra Sir, one stroller per infant is allowed without any charge. We request you to visit https://t.co/WUYecKMmdH for more details. ~Ojasvi

urls.title: FAQs about Baggage Allowance & General Advisories - IndiGo
urls.description: Read the frequently asked questions about baggage allowance for domestic & international flights. Know more on baggage weight, allowed & not allowed items, etc.

data.text: @0xNotthatsundar We are disappointed to hear this. Could you please share your PNR via DM, so we may get it checked and get back to you with an update.  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@PraneshValluvar We regret to hear this, sir. We are getting this checked. Please let us know if you reported the same at the airport on arriving.  ~Diyashi
@MohakudNirmal Sir, we do have free seats available, however, they are limited in inventory and are subject to availability. We look forward to your understanding. ~Yashica
@madlylegal Mr Bhattacharya, please DM us your PNR so we can get this checked and advise accordingly. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@mohit777888 We understand your concern, Mr Choudhary. Could you please share your PNR via DM so we may check and assist you. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@MS__tweets Sir, please DM us the PNR so we can communicate this information with our airport team. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@pralay03 Sir, we are concerned to take note of this and request you to DM us your PNR so we can take a closer look into this. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@ChandraRajoli Good Morning, Sir. You can carry both the liquor and the tinned tuna with you in check-in luggage only. For more details on content/ carriage restriction, you can also refer to https://t.co/DvCzNVHzzc and https://t.co/fJVKU8d0uF. ~Yashica

data.text: @anjusabu Hi, we are here to assist you. Could you confirm if the cards used for payments are 3D gateway secure? ~Yashica

data.text:
@RRam2622 Sir, we have dimple cheeks after reading your resplendent appreciation and we'll certainly share your compliments with our team. It's a beautiful start to our morning to see our customers smile. Looking forward to your pleasant company on-board again soon!💙 ~Yashica

#GoIndiGo

@krishk1983 Capt Krishna, we regret the delay and would like to share your feedback with our team. Please assist us with your PNR details via DM for the same. We hope to serve you better in times to come. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@rishabhjohri99 Sir, we see you have already boarded the flight and request you to also communicate the information to our in-flight crew, meanwhile, we are connecting with our airport team immediately for further action on this. ~Yashica

@beer_fruit Hi, we do try to accommodate local language-speaking crew on all regional flights as far as possible. Exceptions occur when crew flight routes clash. Your feedback though is duly noted and appreciated. ~Yashica

@ravia17401928 Hi, we understand that delays are very unpleasant, especially after a long flight and request you to DM us your PNR so we can raise this with our airport team at the earliest. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@Iagreewithyoub1 Hi, you can carry the beard trimmer with you in your check-in luggage provided the battery is removed, otherwise, we would advise the same to be carried in hand luggage only. For more details on content/ carriage restriction, please visit https://t.co/fJVKU8d0uF. ~Yashica

urls.title: Dangerous Goods, Things not allowed in flight | IndiGo
urls.description: Visit this page to know about which items are prohibited in checked and cabin baggage and what not? Get all information about our dangerous goods policy.

data.text: @sanketsrivasta5 Thank you for your kind words, Sir. We'll surely share your compliments with our teammates and look forward to having your pleasant company on-board again soon. ~Yashica
@jazzy_madonna Sir, we are here to assist you. Please share some more details on your concern with us over DM so we may take a closer look. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@charisma_saraff Hi, we understand it's taking more than usual time. We are contacting the concerned team to connect with you on priority. ~Snigdha
@sathyadinesh1 Sir, we will surely highlight this to our airport team and regret the delay. You can certainly check-in your luggage 3 hours prior to the scheduled time of departure. ~Yashica

@Mukaz7 Sir, we request you to DM us your PNR so we can highlight this to our concerned team. Meanwhile, please confirm if you have highlighted this to our cabin crew. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@IamRtKl Hi, we request you to share your PNR with us over DM so we can get this checked. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@umesh267 Sir, you may carry the same in check-in baggage properly packed and sealed to avoid any damage and leakage. ~Snigdhs
@Kianayema Mr Naik, we regret the experience you had. We would like to speak with you in this regard. Our team will connect with you at the registered contact number. ~Shreya  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@BarnaliBoro11 Hi, we request you to DM us your PNR so we can check and assist you. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@VenkateshJaisw6 Sir, please visit https://t.co/gOAeGTFtJO to know more. ~Shreya
@devenddra0712 Sir, we regret the trouble. Could you please DM the contact number we would like to speak with you in this regard? ~Shreya  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@sachin_varier Sir, we regret the experience. Please DM the PNR so we may check. ~Shreya  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@cprabhas Sir, thank you for the shoutout. We're glad to hear that our staff assisted well. We'll definitely pass it along, please DM the PNR.  #goIndiGo ~Shreya  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@ups4evr Sir, we regret the wait. Please DM the concern in detail along with the PNR so we may check. ~Shreya  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK

@soumyaz007 Sir, it is not mandatory to buy a seat. If you do not wish to pay for the seat, while doing the web check-in, please click on the auto-assign option which is available 6 hours prior to the departure and a seat will be assigned to you as per the availability. ~Shreya
@bsanky1234 Sir, please visit at https://t.co/DL3KiCxZYc for details. ~Shreya

urls.title: Non-standard & Special Baggage Assistance - IndiGo
urls.description: Get support and read frequently asked questions if you carry an over-sized or odd-sized item. Know what items considered as special baggage, at goIndiGo.in.

data.text: @iamKingEjaz Hi, you may let us know your concern via DM to assist you. ~Snigdha
@AjayKalhan Sir, we regret the experience. Please DM the PNR so we may share feedback with the team for review. ~Shreya  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@pratyushbhardw1 Mr Bhardwaj, we'll quickly check and update you. Please DM us the PNR. ~Snigdha
  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@GauravS42407595 Mr Singh, you may carry it in both check-in and hand baggage. If carrying in check-in, please remove the battery. ~Snigdha

@sanchi2703 Ma'am, we understand that spotting mosquitoes on board is definitely discomforting and we take such feedback seriously. While all our aircraft undergo fumigation before every flight departure, moving forward-our team will take better in-flight measures. ~Snigdha
@PrabChats Thank you for the shout-out, Mr Chaturvedi. We are glad that our staff could help you in need. Your words will definitely boost their morale. ~Snigdha
@sauravreddevil We regret to know you feel this way, Sir. Please DM us the PNR so we may look into it. ~Snigdha  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK

@RoshanShetty8 Sir, you may carry in both check-in and cabin properly packed to avoid any leakage. Also, we would like to inform you that in cabin baggage you may carry liquid up to 100 ml only. Hope this helps. ~Snigdha

@ChownaMeinBJP IndiGo really appreciates the inspiration, Sir. We are equally thrilled to link the nation's major cities with the stunning North East. Hope that these sectors would lead to increased tourism and business. We wish Donyi Polo Airport in Itanagar the best. ~Team IndiGo

data.text: @AnujaBissa Ma'am, we'll get it checked, please DM the PNR. ~Shreya  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@ThomasSidd Sir, we regret the delay. Please DM the PNR so we may check. ~Shreya  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@ranjits210 Sir, we regret the experience. Please DM the PNR so we may check. ~Shreya  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@jainabhi234 Mr Jain, we understand waiting is no fun. it takes usually 25-30 minutes to get the baggage delivered to the conveyor belts. However, your feedback is well noted and will be shared with the concerned airport team, please DM us the PNR. ~Snigdha

@Priyank00358203 Ma'am, we never want our passengers to be seated apart from their loved ones, which is why we suggest selecting your preferred seats together at the time of web check-in. We request you to please DM us your PNR, we'll certainly look into this. ~Shreya  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@anindya_b Ma'am, please allow us some time, we'll check this and get back to you. ~Snigdha
@BaiganKiZindagi See you onboard soon :) ~Snigdha
@butjustellme Ma'am, we regret the experience passengers had. Please DM the PNR, we'll check and get back to them. ~Shreya  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@BaiganKiZindagi Sir, you may leave the airport premises. We would like to communicate that check-in counters for international flights close 75 minutes prior to scheduled departure. Hope this helps. ~Snigdha
@vikasvdesai Sir, we regret the experience. Please DM the PNR so we may check. ~Shreya  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@Shivadeep98 Sir, thank you for the shoutout. We're glad to hear that our staff assisted well. We'll definitely pass it along, please DM the PNR.  #goIndiGo ~Shreya  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@aditya031097 Sir, we regret the experience. Our team's representative will contact at the registered contact number to address this. ~Shreya  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@babausuf Sir, please visit https://t.co/KXYf7SSzOg for details. ~Shreya

@MyGovArunachal @AirportHollongi @PMOIndia @ArunachalCMO @JM_Scindia @AAI_Official @aairedner @MDoNER_India @PIB_India @ArunachalDIPR @DDNewsArunachal @nakapnaloffcial Thank you for sharing this moment with us. urls.title: Travel Guidelines: International Arrivals & Departures - IndiGo
urls.description: Mandatory travel guidelines for passengers flying from India to international destinations and back to India. Detailed advisory & requirements at goIndiGo.in

data.text: @chabiskut We regret to hear this Ms Sengupta. Allow us some time to get it checked and get back to you with an update. ~Diyashi

@mr_utkmishra We regret to see this Mr Mishra. We always try deliver the baggage as it was received in. Minor  wear and tear may occur during the loading and offloading of the bag. Please know, we have noted your feedback in this regard. Hoping to serve you better in future. ~Diyashi
@_inscrutableind Hello, please DM us your contact details, so we may connect and assist you. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@sakshi_agarwal7 Ma'am, please share your reference PNR via DM so we may look into it. ~Prahlad  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK

@vivek_pp Sir, we do have a crew that speaks different languages, but since crew members fly multiple sectors, it is possible that the respective crew was not aligned on a particular sector. We hope you understand. ~Prahlad
@KesavarapuKumar Sir, we believe one of our representatives addressed your concern via call and assisted you in the best possible way. ~Prahlad
